mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Mease, James, 1771-1846
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sends him Transactions of the Agricultural Society on New York to be given to Philosophical Society of the city by Dr. Mitchell; he is an authority on the Hessian fly and thinks the fly invades the "second" joint and is entirely an American product.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1792 October 12, Philadelphia, [Pennsylvania] to Tho[ma]s Jefferson, [Philadelphia, Pennsylvania].
